name: Nebula Jalopy
description:
A fake arcade game made for the Dream Arcade Archive jam.

Resources used:

Font: https://www.fontspace.com/barcade-brawl-font-f31534

Screenshake code:  https://stackoverflow.com/questions/28023696/html-canvas-animation-which-incorpo...

Background music is Seductress, by Francis Preve:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHF8dGfnDzTO-8K5mYMohXA
(via YouTube's free audio library)

Other SFX made with BFXR:  https://www.bfxr.net/
